answers.author: Jared Dailey
answers.text:
Thomas...according to ICMA's form of government database, there are 151 cities in the United States operating under the commission form of government.  Attached is a listing of those cities along with their respective populations.
According to a few online sources, commission form has been referred to as the Galveston Plan.  Below is a link to the first page of an article written about the Galveston Plan and the commission structure.  Hopefully if you need it, you can access the entire article.
http://www.jstor.org/pss/30238355

text: I am trying to find out how many cities in the US use the commission form of government.  Also, was this form orginally called the Galvestion Plan?
title: Commission form of government
